verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about soon <S%G1722>afterwards,<s%> <S%G2517><s%> that He [began] <S%G1353>going<s%> <S%G1353>about<s%> from one <S%G4172>city<s%> and <S%G2968>village<s%> to <S%G2596>another,<s%> <S%G2784>proclaiming<s%> and <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> were with Him,

and [also] <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G2323>healed<s%> of <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> and <S%G769>sicknesses:<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> who was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> from <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1140>demons<s%> had <S%G1831>gone<s%> out,

and <S%G2489>Joanna<s%> the <S%G1135>wife<s%> of <S%G5529>Chuza,<s%> Herod's <S%G2012>steward,<s%> and <S%G4677>Susanna,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> were <S%G1247>contributing<s%> to their <S%G1247>support<s%> out of their <S%G5225>private<s%> <S%G5225>means.<s%>

And when a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> were <S%G4896>coming<s%> <S%G4896>together,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> from the <S%G2596>various<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%> were <S%G1975>journeying<s%> to Him, He <S%G3004>spoke<s%> by <S%G1223>way<s%> of a parable: <S%G3850><s%>

"The <S%G4687>sower<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out to <S%G4687>sow<s%> his <S%G4703>seed;<s%> and as he <S%G4687>sowed,<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G3844>beside<s%> the <S%G3598>road;<s%> and it was <S%G2662>trampled<s%> <S%G2662>under<s%> <S%G2662>foot,<s%> and the <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%> <S%G2719>ate<s%> it up.

"And <S%G2087>other<s%> [seed] <S%G2667>fell<s%> on <S%G4073>rocky<s%> [soil,] and as soon as it <S%G5453>grew<s%> up, it <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G3583>away,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> it <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2429>moisture.<s%>
"And <S%G2087>other<s%> [seed] <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3319><s%> the <S%G173>thorns;<s%> and the <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G4855>grew<s%> up with it, and <S%G638>choked<s%> it out.

"And <S%G2087>other<s%> [seed] <S%G4098>fell<s%> into the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1093>soil,<s%> and <S%G5453>grew<s%> up, and <S%G4160>produced<s%> a <S%G2590>crop<s%> a <S%G1542>hundred<s%> <S%G1542>times<s%> as <S%G1542>great.<s%>" As He <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> He would <S%G5455>call<s%> out, "He who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear.<s%>"
And His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> [began] <S%G1905>questioning<s%> Him as to <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> might be.

And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> " To you it has been <S%G1325>granted<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> but to the <S%G3062>rest<s%> [it is] in <S%G3850>parables,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G991>seeing<s%> they may not <S%G991>see,<s%> and <S%G191>hearing<s%> they may not <S%G4920>understand.<s%>
<S%G1161>"Now<s%> the <S%G3850>parable<s%> is <S%G3778>this:<s%> the <S%G4703>seed<s%> is the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

"And <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3844>beside<s%> the <S%G3598>road<s%> are <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G191>heard;<s%> <S%G1534>then<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> and <S%G142>takes<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> from their <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that they may not <S%G4100>believe<s%> and be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

"And <S%G3588>those<s%> on the <S%G4073>rocky<s%> [soil are] those <S%G3739>who,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> with <S%G5479>joy;<s%> and <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> [firm] <S%G4491>root;<s%> they <S%G4100>believe<s%> for a <S%G2540>while,<s%> and in <S%G2540>time<s%> of <S%G3986>temptation<s%> <S%G868>fall<s%> <S%G868>away.<s%>

"And the [seed] which <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G173>thorns,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> are the ones who have <S%G191>heard,<s%> and as they <S%G4198>go<s%> on their <S%G4198>way<s%> they are <S%G4846>choked<s%> with <S%G3308>worries<s%> and <S%G4149>riches<s%> and <S%G2237>pleasures<s%> of [this] <S%G979>life,<s%> and <S%G5052>bring<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5052>fruit<s%> to <S%G5052>maturity.<s%>

"And the [seed] in the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1093>soil,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> are the ones <S%G3748>who<s%> have <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> in an <S%G2570>honest<s%> and <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and <S%G2722>hold<s%> it <S%G2722>fast,<s%> and <S%G2592>bear<s%> <S%G2592>fruit<s%> with <S%G5281>perseverance.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> after <S%G681>lighting<s%> a <S%G3088>lamp<s%> <S%G2572>covers<s%> it over with a <S%G4632>container,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5087>puts<s%> it <S%G5270>under<s%> a <S%G2825>bed;<s%> but he <S%G5087>puts<s%> it on a <S%G3087>lampstand,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1531>come<s%> in may <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G5457>light.<s%>

"For <S%G3756>nothing<s%> is <S%G2927>hidden<s%> that shall not <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5318>evident,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> [anything] <S%G614>secret<s%> that shall not be <S%G1097>known<s%> and <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G5318>light.<s%>

<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> <S%G991>take<s%> <S%G991>care<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> you <S%G191>listen;<s%> for <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2192>has,<s%> to him shall [more] be <S%G1325>given;<s%> and <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> does not <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G1380>thinks<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> shall be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from him."

And His <S%G3384>mother<s%> and <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> to Him, and they were <S%G3756>unable<s%> <S%G1410><s%> to <S%G4940>get<s%> to Him <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3793>crowd.<s%>
And it was <S%G518>reported<s%> to Him, "Your <S%G3384>mother<s%> and Your <S%G80>brothers<s%> are <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>outside,<s%> <S%G2309>wishing<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> You."

But He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "My <S%G3384>mother<s%> and My <S%G80>brothers<s%> are <S%G3778>these<s%> who <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> it."

<S%G1161>Now<s%> it <S%G1096>came<s%> about on <S%G1520>one<s%> of [those] <S%G2250>days,<s%> that He and His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1684>got<s%> into a <S%G4143>boat,<s%> and He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Let us <S%G1330>go<s%> <S%G1330>over<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> of the <S%G3041>lake.<s%>" And they <S%G321>launched<s%> out.

But as they were <S%G4126>sailing<s%> along He <S%G879>fell<s%> <S%G879>asleep;<s%> and a <S%G2978>fierce<s%> <S%G2978>gale<s%> of <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> upon the <S%G3041>lake,<s%> and they [began] to be <S%G4845>swamped<s%> and to be in <S%G2793>danger.<s%>

And they <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him and <S%G1326>woke<s%> Him up, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1988>"Master,<s%> <S%G1988>Master,<s%> we are <S%G622>perishing!<s%>" And being <S%G1326>aroused,<s%> He <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> and the <S%G2830>surging<s%> <S%G2830>waves,<s%> and they <S%G3973>stopped,<s%> and it <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G1055>calm.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4226>"Where<s%> is your <S%G4102>faith<s%>?" And they were <S%G5399>fearful<s%> and <S%G2296>amazed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> that He <S%G2004>commands<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G417>winds<s%> and the <S%G5204>water,<s%> and they <S%G5219>obey<s%> Him?"
And they <S%G2668>sailed<s%> to the <S%G5561>country<s%> of the <S%G1086>Gerasenes,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is <S%G495>opposite<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

And when He had <S%G1831>come<s%> out <S%G1909>onto<s%> the <S%G1093>land,<s%> He was <S%G5221>met<s%> by a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> from the <S%G4172>city<s%> who was <S%G2192>possessed<s%> with <S%G1140>demons;<s%> and who had not <S%G1746>put<s%> on any <S%G2440>clothing<s%> for a <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G5550>time,<s%> and was not <S%G3306>living<s%> in a <S%G3614>house,<s%> but in the <S%G3418>tombs.<s%>

And <S%G3708>seeing<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> he <S%G349>cried<s%> out and <S%G4363>fell<s%> <S%G4363>before<s%> Him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> in a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do I have to do with You, <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of the <S%G5310>Most<s%> <S%G5310>High<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>? I <S%G1189>beg<s%> You, do not <S%G928>torment<s%> me."

For He had been <S%G3853>commanding<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> to <S%G1831>come<s%> out of the <S%G444>man.<s%> For it had <S%G4884>seized<s%> him <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5550>times;<s%> and he was <S%G1195>bound<s%> with <S%G254>chains<s%> and <S%G3976>shackles<s%> and <S%G5442>kept<s%> <S%G5442>under<s%> <S%G5442>guard;<s%> and [yet] he would <S%G1284>burst<s%> his <S%G1199>fetters<s%> and be <S%G1643>driven<s%> by the <S%G1140>demon<s%> into the <S%G2048>desert.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G5101>"What<s%> is your <S%G3686>name<s%>?" And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3003>"Legion<s%>"; for <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1140>demons<s%> had <S%G1525>entered<s%> him.
And they were <S%G3870>entreating<s%> Him not to <S%G2004>command<s%> them to <S%G565>depart<s%> into the <S%G12>abyss.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there was a <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G1006>feeding<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> on the <S%G3735>mountain;<s%> and [the demons] <S%G3870>entreated<s%> Him to <S%G2010>permit<s%> them to <S%G1525>enter<s%> the swine. And He <S%G2010>gave<s%> them <S%G2010>permission.<s%>

And the <S%G1140>demons<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out from the <S%G444>man<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G5519>swine;<s%> and the <S%G34>herd<s%> <S%G3729>rushed<s%> <S%G2596>down<s%> the <S%G2911>steep<s%> <S%G2911>bank<s%> into the <S%G3041>lake,<s%> and were <S%G638>drowned.<s%>

And when the <S%G1006>herdsmen<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> what had <S%G1096>happened,<s%> they <S%G5343>ran<s%> <S%G5343>away<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> it in the <S%G4172>city<s%> and [out] in the <S%G68>country.<s%>

And [the people] <S%G1831>went<s%> out to <S%G3708>see<s%> what had <S%G1096>happened;<s%> and they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> from <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G1140>demons<s%> had <S%G1831>gone<s%> out, <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G2521>down<s%> at the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2439>clothed<s%> and in his <S%G4993>right<s%> <S%G4993>mind;<s%> and they became <S%G5399>frightened.<s%>
And <S%G3588>those<s%> who had <S%G3708>seen<s%> it <S%G518>reported<s%> to them <S%G4459>how<s%> the man who was demon-possessed had been <S%G4982>made<s%> <S%G4982>well.<s%>

And <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G4128>people<s%> of the <S%G4066>country<s%> of the <S%G1086>Gerasenes<s%> and the <S%G4066>surrounding<s%> <S%G4066>district<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> Him to <S%G565>depart<s%> from them; for they were <S%G4912>gripped<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5401>fear;<s%> and He <S%G1684>got<s%> into a <S%G4143>boat,<s%> and <S%G5290>returned.<s%>

But the <S%G435>man<s%> from <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G1140>demons<s%> had <S%G1831>gone<s%> out was <S%G1189>begging<s%> Him that he might <S%G1510>accompany<s%> <S%G4862><s%> Him; but He <S%G630>sent<s%> him <S%G630>away,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

" <S%G5290>Return<s%> to your <S%G3624>house<s%> and <S%G1334>describe<s%> <S%G3745>what<s%> <S%G3745>great<s%> <S%G3745>things<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4160>done<s%> for you." And he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away,<s%> <S%G2784>proclaiming<s%> <S%G2596>throughout<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3745>what<s%> <S%G3745>great<s%> <S%G3745>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%> for him.
And as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5290>returned,<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G588>welcomed<s%> Him, for they had <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G4328>waiting<s%> for Him.

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2383>Jairus,<s%> and he was an <S%G758>official<s%> of the <S%G4864>synagogue;<s%> and he <S%G4098>fell<s%> at Jesus' <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and [began] to <S%G3870>entreat<s%> Him to <S%G1525>come<s%> to his <S%G3624>house;<s%>

for he <S%G1510>had<s%> an <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G2364>daughter,<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> old, and she was <S%G599>dying.<s%> But as He <S%G5217>went,<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G4846>pressing<s%> <S%G4846>against<s%> Him.

And a <S%G1135>woman<s%> who <S%G1722>had<s%> a <S%G4511>hemorrhage<s%> <S%G129><s%> for <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> and <S%G2480>could<s%> not be <S%G2323>healed<s%> by <S%G3762>anyone,<s%>

<S%G4334>came<s%> up <S%G3693>behind<s%> Him, and <S%G681>touched<s%> the <S%G2899>fringe<s%> of His <S%G2440>cloak;<s%> and <S%G3916>immediately<s%> her <S%G4511>hemorrhage<s%> <S%G129><s%> <S%G2476>stopped.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> is the one who <S%G681>touched<s%> Me?" And while they were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G720>denying<s%> it, <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1988>"Master,<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> are <S%G4912>crowding<s%> and <S%G598>pressing<s%> upon You."
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5100>"Someone<s%> did <S%G681>touch<s%> Me, for I was <S%G1097>aware<s%> that <S%G1411>power<s%> had <S%G1831>gone<s%> out of Me."
